wimale alutha hambuna prado eke nagala bala kumaraya plen elawana wegen arala giya murungagaha walawwa paththata.mehema yanawa balagena hitapu thatta wije ka gahala kiwwa “sar kalisama galawala yanna” kiyala.habayi meka ahunoth wimaleta duka hitheyi kiyala hithalada manda eeka hithin witharayi kiwwe.walawwata lanweddi tharaha niwila hindado manda aapu wegenma rajathumata katha karanna giye na wimale.pasanga pihituwala wanda watila ahanawa”paswan dahasakata buduwanna dewayini,ane minissu issaraha aayeth mage redda galawanna epa,balu gaththata anukampa karala muna me ratata ena eeka nawaththala denna.”rajathuma baluwa mu mokatada mepara andinna hadanne kiyala.”ane ban,umbae redi na kiyala amuthuwen kiyanna deyakda.onna ohe gihin woyis kat ekak dipan muna enne me rata adhirajyawadi balawegawalin beraganna kiyala.”
welasana gihin parawal gane awidinna bari nisa kiyapu welawatama kolla giya ethenta.

bauddha waidyawarayeku warak ma samanga kiyasitiye, ohu igenagath sidni weda widuhale pradhani, puprasiddha mahacharyathuma siya palamu dina deshanaya arambaamin kiyasitiye, “apa iganwimata yana deyin adak labana wasara kihipayedi waradiwe,gataluwa wanne ee kumana adada yanna apa nodanimayi” anna niyama widyagnyayan.

santha anthoni munithuma onna ithin amdan skole gihin iwara nisa podi job kattak hoya hoya inna kota, job ekak set una peduruthuduwa dewundara thuduwa bas ekaka kondosthara kenek widiyata, ithin miniha harima unanduwen thamayi me job eka karanne, miniha ithin mara asayi bayila ahanna, bas eke yana ena hama welawema miniha bayila kasat ahanawa, dawasak amda bas eke antan jonsge bayila kasat ekak aha aha yana athara eka paratama kasat eka hira una, ee welawe kasat eke giyeth katharagam rupa sundariya mananperi gana thiyena amdan aasama sinduwak, amdan ee welawe hitiye bas eke pitipasse, miniha hani hanikata bas eke issarahata gihin kasat ekata mokada une kiyala baluwa, mara sin eka kasat pis eka hirawela kasat eka athule, amdanta dan hodatama mala, miniha kasat pis eka adala eliyata gaththa, eth eeka hirawela thibuna nisa kasat pis eke patiye bhagayak kadila podi pattam wela thamayi pis eka eliyata aawe.
